/pyload/config.description: Choose a Share for pyLoad configuration. Eg: create a Share called pyload-config for this purpose alone.
/pyload/config.label: Config Storage

/pyload/downloads.description: Choose a Share for pyLoad downloads. Eg: create a Share called pyload-downloads for this purpose alone. You can also assign other media Shares on the system after installation.
/pyload/downloads.label: Downloads Storage

PUID.description: Enter a valid UID to run pyLoad with. It must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
PUID.label: UID

PGID.description: Enter a valid GID to use along with the above UID. It(or the above UID) must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
PGID.label: GID

pyLoad.description: Free and Open Source download manager written in Pure Python and designed to be extremely lightweight, fully customizable and remotely manageable
